column5: SNGX Keep reading from the brochure BB This is a brochure co It gets changed every six months by the way moron I swear you have to walk around with sucker written on your forehead

SNGX its hard to get upside even with positive news in this market until trade war and other global growth fears are dampened it will be hard to hold onto a run without it dumping the only thing we can rely on is valuation with FDA approval not too far away 2 drugs in phase 3 both with potential of 200million in sales from commercialization 1 drug in phase 2 ceo and director bought 14000 shares or something at 77 not significant but its positive Euro patent other assets they have improve valuation Zacks article and several other articles showing price potential all above 4 with current valuation this is really at a turning point now this close news and developments in this last half of 2019 i think many good things and upside to come will just take time this is a slow moving low volume stock for a long hold
